item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 4.6. 暂退法（Dropout） — 动手学深度学习 2.0.0-beta0 documentation in the user temberature at 2022-05-26T05:59:23
item.description:
in reference to:

需要说明的是，暂退法的原始论文提到了一个关于有性繁殖的类比： 神经网络过拟合与每一层都依赖于前一层激活值相关，称这种情况为“共适应性”。 作者认为，暂退法会破坏共适应性，就像有性生殖会破坏共适应的基因一样。

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 将想法送入你的轨道（Orbit） in the user temberature at 2022-06-05T05:02:44
item.description:
in reference to:

你的 PDF 和电子书阅读器中的标注，可以自然地这个中心化的 SRS 中找到，而不是封存在某个无法访问的侧边栏中。现代操作系统，会根据聊天消息或电子邮件，尝试创建日历事件或建立联系人。类似地，SRS 系统也可能根据你标为书签的链接，或重复搜索的短语，来尝试创建 SRS 卡片。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 金融消费者如何购买 in the user temberature at 2022-08-30T15:08:35
item.description:
in reference to:

、合同条款复杂、坑多，金融机构抱怨消费者预期高、拒绝承担风险、不理智。究其原因在于，消费者自身和金融机构对于消费者的金融行为都没有认知和把握。 本书全面梳理了消费者金融行为这个重要但“冷门”的主题，话题涉及常见的金融行为，包括投资、保险、借款、储蓄、资金管理、缴税和规避欺诈，综合了各个主题最前沿的研究，并且以案例结合观点展开阐述。 本书讨论了人们金融行为的决定因素和条件，如个体差异和个性、对风险得失的理解、自信、信任、风险偏好、时间偏好、决策制定和自我调控等等，分析了针对不同的金融消费行为，这些因素是如何地影响着

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 我是如何艰难地克服「效率成瘾」的？ in the user temberature at 2022-09-02T09:20:22
item.description:
in reference to:

另外一个机制是 P.A.R.A 中的 Archive，归档这个概念的意义其实也是非常非常重要的。就像我会把所有内容都归档到我的 DEVONthink 里面，我可以看到我所有的推文、所有的笔记，然后也可以看到我所有的网页高亮，还有我发布过的博客或者是 Newsletter 都会归档到我的 DEVONthink 里面。

in reference to:

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated OpenAI API in the user temberature at 2022-12-13T16:00:10
item.description:
in reference to:

There are two ways to limit the likelihood of the API making up an answer.Provide a ground truth for the API. If you provide the API with a body of text to answer questions about (like a Wikipedia entry) it will be less likely to confabulate a response.Use a low probability and show the API how to say "I don't know". If the API understands that in cases where it's less certain about a response that saying "I don't know" or some variation is appropriate, it will be less inclined to make up answers.

item.description:
in reference to:

Now, one thing to point out is base models are not assistants. (10:37) They don't want to make answers to your questions, they want to complete documents. If you tell them to write a poem about the bread and cheese, it will answer questions with more questions, it's completing what it thinks is a document. However, you can prompt them in a specific way for base models that is more likely to work.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated State of GPT | BRK216HFS in the user temberature at 2023-05-28T11:01:26
item.description:
in reference to:

It has to do with the asymmetry between how easy computationally it is to compare versus generate.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated State of GPT | BRK216HFS in the user temberature at 2023-05-28T11:08:28
item.description:
in reference to:

I think to a large extent, prompting is just making up for this cognitive difference between these two architectures like our brains here and LLM brains.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated State of GPT | BRK216HFS in the user temberature at 2023-05-28T11:08:59
item.description:
in reference to:

These transformers need tokens to think

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated State of GPT | BRK216HFS in the user temberature at 2023-05-28T11:12:18
item.description:
in reference to:

if you don't ask it to check, its not going to check by itself it's just a token simulator.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated State of GPT | BRK216HFS in the user temberature at 2023-05-28T11:15:23
item.description:
in reference to:

LLMs don't want to succeed, they want to imitate.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated State of GPT | BRK216HFS in the user temberature at 2023-05-28T11:19:18
item.description:
in reference to:

One thing to keep in mind, again, is that these transformers by default may not know what they don't know.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated State of GPT | BRK216HFS in the user temberature at 2023-05-28T11:22:04
item.description:
in reference to:

You have some memory over how some documentation of the library works but it's much better to look it up. The same applies here.
